sentences.sContent: Spain ceded the Philippines to the United States.
sentences.sContent_eng: Spain ceded the Philippines to the United States.
sentences.sCn: 西班牙将菲律宾群岛割让给美国。

sentences.sContent: This island was ceded to Spain more than one hundred years ago.
sentences.sContent_eng: This island was ceded to Spain more than one hundred years ago.
sentences.sCn: 这个岛屿在一百多年以前就割让给西班牙了。
